eutros.multiblocktweaker.crafttweaker.gtwrap.interfaces

Interface IBlockPattern


  • public interface IBlockPattern
    This is what defines the required structure of a multiblock
    See Also:
    BlockPatternBuilder
    ZenClass:
    mods.gregtech.multiblock.IBlockPattern

    • Method Detail

      • getInternal

        @NotNull
@NotNull gregtech.api.multiblock.BlockPattern getInternal()

      • getFingerLength

        int getFingerLength()
        Returns:
        The finger length of the pattern, which is along the Z axis.

      • getThumbLength

        int getThumbLength()
        Returns:
        The thumb length of the pattern, which is along the Y axis.

      • getPalmLength

        int getPalmLength()
        Returns:
        The palm length of the pattern, which is along the X axis.

      • checkPatternAt

        IPatternMatchContext checkPatternAt(crafttweaker.api.world.IWorld world,
                                    crafttweaker.api.world.IBlockPos centerPos,
                                    crafttweaker.api.world.IFacing facing)
        Check whether the pattern matches a structure.

        Returns null if there is no match found.

        Parameters:
        world - The world to check in.
        centerPos - The position of the controller.
        facing - The direction to match in, opposite to the direction the controller is facing.
        Returns:
        The context of the match, or null if there was none.
